name: Boisemusicinforetrieval.GitHub.io
tagline: Website for Boise Music Information Retrieval
body: Music Information Retrieval (MIR) research at Boise State University is currently focused on the problem of Automatic Music Transcription (AMT). The goal is to allow a person with a personal mobile device such as a cell phone or tablet computer to capture a monophonic signal of a live music performance in a noisy environment and convert that signal to MIDI or standard western music notation files for each of the individual instruments.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
